```{r loading data}
rm(list = ls())

# load packages 
for (pkg in c("tidyverse", "igraph", "visNetwork", "data.table", "R.utils", "RPostgreSQL", "cowplot", "maditr", "stringr", "stringi")) {
  library(pkg, character.only = TRUE)
  }

# connect to postgresql to get our data
conn <- dbConnect(drv = PostgreSQL(), 
                  dbname = "sdad", 
                  host = "10.250.124.195", 
                  port = 5432, 
                  user = Sys.getenv("db_userid"), 
                  password = Sys.getenv("db_pwd"))

# query the users_gh data from github data 
users_gh <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT login, company, created_at 
                              FROM github.users_gh")

# disconnect from postgresql database 
dbDisconnect(conn)
```
